title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Competencies: Collaborative Problem-Based Learning and Peer Support in Technology-Enhanced Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Concepts and Experience Using Online Collaboration Tools
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can solve complex mathematical problems through effective collaboration with peers in technology-supported environments.
Learners can objectively evaluate peers’ problem-solving processes and outcomes using a peer assessment rubric.
Learners can improve problem-solving strategies by incorporating peer feedback collected during project implementation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
